description: This file initializes a website knowledge base and an agent, then runs asynchronous methods to load data and generate a response about how the system works.

methods.name: knowledge_base.aload
methods.description: Asynchronously loads the website knowledge base, optionally recreating the data.

methods.name: agent.aprint_response
methods.description: Asynchronously generates and prints a response from the agent based on the knowledge base.
